list_definition.definition: (a garment, especially a sweater, with) a high round neck

list_ex_of_english: Her wardrobe consists mostly of jeans and turtleneck sweaters, though she also owns an extremely wrinkle-resistant little black dress for those occasions when dressing up is unavoidable.
He wears an orange flat cap, purple vest, pink turtleneck, regular bell-bottom jeans, and boots.
In 1973, the band wore gold jackets, navy blue pants, navy blue turtleneck sweaters, and no hat, for one game.
He wore a black turtleneck and jeans.
Boys are required to wear collared shirts and ties or turtlenecks.
He always wears a black turtleneck sweater and gray jeans.
He wears a long purple turtleneck on his sweater.
However, a maillot may also include a plunging neckline, turtleneck-style top, or revealing cutouts.
